title: Introduction
content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights.

title: Information We Collect
content: Personal Information: Name, email, login credentials (if you create an account).
Usage Data: Pages visited, recipes generated, subscription activity.
Input Data: Ingredients and preferences you share with the chatbot (used only to generate recipes).
Payment Information: Processed securely via third-party payment providers (we do not store card details).

title: How We Use Your Information
content: To provide and improve our services.
To personalize recipe suggestions.
To process subscriptions and payments.
To communicate updates, offers, or policy changes.

title: Data Sharing
content: We do not sell or rent your personal information.
We may share limited data with:
Payment processors (for subscriptions).
Analytics services (to improve performance).
Legal authorities (if required by law).

title: Data Retention
content: Your account data will be stored as long as you maintain an active account.
You can request deletion of your data at any time.

title: Cookies
content: Save your preferences.
Track analytics for performance improvement.
You can disable cookies in your browser, but some features may not work properly.

title: Your Rights
content: Access, update, or delete your personal data.
Cancel your subscription at any time.
Request a copy of your stored data.

title: Security
content: We implement industry-standard measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.

title: Changes to Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted here with the updated date.

title: Contact
content: If you have questions, email us at [Your email/contact form link].
